multitext.text: To play this game you require the latest version Flash Player. Please click the link below and follow the quick and simple installation instructions.
Note that any Jackpots are shown and paid in your account currency.

ONLY HIGHEST WIN PAYS PER LINE WIN COMBINATIONS PAY LEFT TO RIGHT ONLY EXCEPT [SCATTER] WHICH PAYS ANY PAYLINE WINS ARE MULTIPLIED BY THE LINE BET. GAME IS PLAYED WITH 50 LINES ONLY MALFUNCTIONS VOID ALL PLAYS AND PAYS
WITH INCREASING MULTIPLIER AND [WILD] AS EXTRA WILD!
FREE GAMES BEGIN WITH X2 MULTIPLIER WITH EVERY TWO SPINS, MULTIPLIER GOES UP +1 ALL WINS DURING A SPIN ARE MULTIPLIED BY THE MULTIPLIER´S VALUE DURING THAT SPIN

[WILD] APPEARS IN THE MIDDLE POSITION OF THE MIDDLE REEL DURING ALL FREE GAME SPINS [WILD] IS EXTRA WILD, SUBSTITUTING FOR ALL SYMBOLS EXCEPT [SCATTER]
MORE FREE GAMES CANNOT BE RETRIGGERED

SIX OF THE SYMBOLS IN THE GAME ARE STACKED IN TWOS ON THE REELS
GRAPHICALLY, THEY APPEAR AS ONE LONG IMAGE. EACH IMAGE OCCUPIES TWO REEL POSITIONS, REPRESENTING TWO SEPARATE AND IDENTICAL SYMBOLS, ONE ON TOP OF THE OTHER. THE SYMBOLS PAY REGULARLY, INDEPENDENT OF ONE ANOTHER
3 OR MORE [SCATTER] ANYWHERE WINS 10 FREE GAMES WITH INCREASING MULTIPLIER!
[WILD] EXTRA FROZEN WILD IN FREE GAMES!
WITH INCREASING MULTIPLIER AND [WILD] AS EXTRA WILD

phrase.text: This bet is not currently available.
There has been an error retrieving your previous game, please refresh
You have exceeded the maximum possible winning limit for any one bet. Please change your bet or cashout.
Play for fun. If you would like to Play for Real, please log into or create an account.
You are part way through a game. Please click to resume.

5-Reel 50-Line Slots
Iron Man 2’s objective is to obtain winning symbol combinations by spinning the reels.
TO PLAY THE GAME: LINE BET Increase the ‘LINE BET’ by clicking the ‘BET PER LINE’ button. Once maximum LINE BET is reached, clicking the button again will reset the bet to the minimum BET PER LINE. LINES * Iron Man 2 is fixed at 50 paylines. TOTAL BET Shows the line bet multiplied by the number of paylines. SPIN Clicking ‘SPIN’ spins the reels with the selected LINE BET and TOTAL BET. BET MAX Clicking ‘BET MAX’ spins the reels and the maximum possible BET PER LINE. INFO Click the ‘INFO’ button to view winning paylines and payout information. Scroll through INFO screens by using the left and right arrows. To view paylines click “SHOW PAYLINES”. To Exit the PAYTABLE click the ‘BACK’ button.
DISPLAY BOXES: LINES: Display’s the number of lines active. Note this can’t be changed from 50. LINE BET: Display’s the amount staked per line. TOTAL BET: Display’s the total bet per game. WIN: Display’s the winning amount.
AUTO START There is an auto start function available that will start each spin automatically until either something occurs that requires your intervention or the number of set spins expires. Select your desired number of spins using the + and - buttons. Click ‘AUTO START’ to commence the spins. Click 'STOP' to cancel auto start.
ABOUT PAYOUTS: * If two winning combinations occur on the same line, the higher of them is paid out. * Win combinations must occur from left to right. * The Wild Symbol is the Shield logo. It can stand for any other symbol, excluding scatter, to make the best possible winning combination. * There is a separate payout for 2 or more consecutive Wild Symbols on an active payline. Line Bet and Total Bet are different. The line bet shows how much you're betting on a single payline. The total bet shows how much you're spending in this game round. Payouts shown in the paytable are multiplied by the line bet, not by the total bet. If more than one active payline has a winning combination, the winnings are added up.
SCATTER SYMBOL: * Scatter symbols do not have to occur on a particular payline. * Payout for scatter symbols is multiplied by the total Bet. * If there are 2 or more Scatters in the spin results, the payout earned is multiplied by the total bet and added to payline winnings. * If 3, 4 or 5 Scatter Symbols appear on the anywhere on the reels simultaneously 10 Free Games are won.
FREE GAMES * Free Games begin with a x2 multiplier, with every 2 spins this multiplier increases by 1. * Click “CLICK TO START” to begin free spins. * A special Wild symbol will appear in the middle of the reels during Free Games. It substitutes for all symbols except Scatter. * More Free Games cannot be triggered. * When Free Games have expired clicking CONTINUE will return you to the regular slot reels.
DISPLAY * SPINS LEFT – Indicates free spins remaining. * FREE GAMES WIN – Indicates current winnings from free spins. * MULTIPLIER – Indicates the multiplier.
Malfunction voids all pays and plays.
This game has a Return to Player of 91.323%.
